name: Azure Horizon
description:
Super Early Release!

Azure Horizon - Paladins of the Sky  

Defend the skies of Camelot as one of its famed Sky Knights!  Pilot fighters equipped with the experimental Excalibur Drive against an oppressive force.  

This release is a prototype of a Bullet Hell Shooter idea I've been kicking around.  

Current release is one intro level that is about 80% feature complete with one fighter.

Move: WASD

Fire: Mouse 1

Homing Missiles: Mouse 2

This is my first game ever, so feedback is welcome!  Please be constructive!
